Room.Name: Stone Cottage
Room.ShortDescription: This simple cottage belongs to a woodsman who sells firewood.
Room.LongDescription: The small stone house has an earthen roof and no windows, but appears to be clean and well maintained. The chimney emits a good smelling smoke, and there is also the smell of roasting meat. The walk way is lined with river rock, and flowers grow on the roof. A small pen of goats is around to the back.
